New Records: Lockie Ferguson became the second bowler to deliver four maidens in a T20I
Key Match Events: Lockie Ferguson took 3 wickets for 0 runs in 4 overs, helping New Zealand win by 7 wickets
Post-Match Reflections: New Zealand signed off a disappointing T20 World Cup campaign with a dominant win over Papua New Guinea
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was delayed by an hour due to morning showers
Others: Trent Boult, playing in his last T20 World Cup match, went on to pocket two wickets
